title: Sekai De Ichiban Toui Koi
alternative_title: Sekai de ichiban Tooi Koi; The Farthest Love In the World; 世界でいちばん遠い恋; ; Sekai de Ichiban Tooi Koi
status: Sekai de ichiban Tooi Koi; The Farthest Love In the World; 世界でいちばん遠い恋; ; Sekai de Ichiban Tooi Koi
description:
Description :
        "I've never known a love that stirred my heart like this before."A solitary violinist and an investor with hearing difficulties.A heart-stopping love story between two people living in opposite worlds.[Ayumu Isuzu, 29, investor.]He has a severe sensorineural hearing loss, but because of this, he has a strong sense of needing to be more independent than others, and is reluctant about getting help from others.[Mibu Touka, 19, violinist].Although he has talent, he is isolated and neglected at the university due to his unapproachable personality and unusual playing style.Isuzu doesn't know soun...
